'''Alpha v1.0.2_01'''<ref>{{ytl|whMdI5arxpA|Minecraft 5-clock with 4 doors because I couldn't do 5|HALPCat|July 6, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|o9PUi9fm7Qk|Minecraft Pig Meat Factory|kasp0021|July 6, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|yeR5XDy5A10|How to mine efficiently in Minecraft|CommanderPT|July 6, 2010}}</ref> is an version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 6, 2010, which made changes to [[redstone]]-related [[item]]s.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
<!--Can we be absolutely sure these were added in 1.0.2_01 and not 1.0.2? How do we know they weren't released in 1.0.2 first, a major bug was discovered in that version, and then 1.0.2_01 was released before/during the blog post?-->
'''[[File:Redstone Ore JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Redstone Ore]]'''
* Now emit red dust particles.

'''[[File:Redstone Torch JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Redstone Torch]] '''
* Now only send redstone signals into [[block]]s above or next to them.<ref>[[wordofnotch:776447207|I’m considering making the not torches less annoying]] – The Word of Notch, July 6, 2010</ref>
* Now emit red dust particles when lit, instead of flame particles.</onlyinclude>

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Redstone Dust JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Redstone Dust]]'''
* No longer breaks when stepped on.{{needs testing|may have been changed in v1.0.2|type=untestable}}
* No longer connects through solid blocks diagonally down.
* Now emit red dust particles.{{needs testing|may have been changed in v1.0.2|type=untestable}}
* The texture was slightly changed.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* When trying to place a button on top of a block with a support block adjacent, the button will attach to the support block instead of floating.
